data.message: Phase 4: Confidence Decay & Maintenance implementation: Completed. Added decay.py with explicit math, migration m003_add_reinforcement, 4 MCP tools (duro_apply_decay, duro_reembed, duro_maintenance_report, duro_reinforce_fact), and golden decay test (5/5 passing). Committed fba51ff.
